recipe.title: Basic French Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tablespoons white-wine vinegar or fresh lemon juice
instructions: In a bowl whisk together the vinegar, the mustard, and salt and pepper to taste, add the oil in a stream, whisking, and whisk the vinaigrette until it is emulsified.
